title: My Google Pixel was perfectly fine, and suddenly the screen died and won't switch on again
content: Google pixel was working perfectly fine, suddenly the screen died and even after charging the phone with original charger for 3 continuious hours, it refused to switch on, when i took the same to prestine mobile repair center (Google refuse to open service center in India) they informed the motherboard is not working anymore. Its hard to believe, such issue to happen to a high end phone, used in perfect manner.
